title: Covid   Is Nothing Like the Spanish Flu
description: A widely cited stat about death rates seems to argue otherwise  but it s surely incorrect  So how d it end up in the research literature
content: Unfortunately  the two purported sources for the     percent fatality rate were published more than   years ago and their authors are no longer with us  I was able to reach public health expert Niall Johnson  however  primary author of a   study that prod    chars
